meanings.definition: A person or thing that goes in or enters.
meanings.sent1: The ingo walked through the door.
meanings.sent2: The new student was an ingo in our class.
meanings.sent3: The curious cat was an ingo into the mysterious box.
meanings.sent4: The key was the ingo to unlocking the treasure chest.
meanings.sent5: The ingo, a small robot, entered the spaceship with a beep.

meanings.definition: A person who is admitted to a place or group.
meanings.sent1: The ingo was warmly welcomed by the team.
meanings.sent2: She became an ingo of the exclusive club.
meanings.sent3: The little puppy was the ingo to the family's hearts.
meanings.sent4: Winning the competition made him the ingo of the champions.
meanings.sent5: The ingo, a new employee, quickly became part of the team.

meanings.definition: The act of going in or entering.
meanings.sent1: The ingo of the key into the lock was smooth.
meanings.sent2: His ingo into the dark cave was brave.
meanings.sent3: The ingo of the ball into the goal brought cheers.
meanings.sent4: The ingo of the spaceship into orbit was a success.
meanings.sent5: The ingo of the bird into its nest was graceful.
